subject: Testing package private classes
msgSnippet: Hi, How can I test package private classes with JUnit. Our test cases are generally in a unittest subdirectory of the directory where the classes being test
messageBody:
Hi,

How can I test package private classes with JUnit. Our test cases are
generally in a "unittest" subdirectory of the directory where the
classes being test are.

Anand


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
